ModuleTitle: Advanced Urban Planning Theories and Practice
ModuleDescription: This module aims to expose students to global urbanisation trends that urban planning must respond to. Topics chosen for discussion in class are directly relevant to the Singapore context such as smart nation, resilience, urban farming and compact vertical garden city developments. The course hopes to bridge theory and practice and adopts a flip learning model which emphasizes self learning and discovery by project works and interactions with practitioners and researchers in the field.
Prerequisite: RE3102 ADVANCED TOPICS IN URBAN PLANNING
